attributes.title: Politics in the App Store
attributes.review: Wish could rate zero stars. After downloading, my phone has never glitched more. My battery would barely charge. It also required so much personal info that is not necessary for general analysis. CREDIT CARD INFO UNNECESSARY. I feel like I may be robbed and even murdered by the government with the amount of info had to give them to continue. Left a very sour taste in my mouth. At least sleepy Joe Biden didn't destroy my phone's battery. I can never trust my president ever again.

attributes.title: Tiktok
attributes.review: I downloaded this app a few days ago, it just finished loading yesterday, that sucked. It made my phone turn orange, and it got overheated every time I went into the app. That night, I heard noises coming from my phone, so I opened it, and the 10-hour version of â€do you want to build a wallâ€ was playing. My whole camera roll immediately filled with pictures of donny tâ€™s nudes, so I deleted the app. I don't recommend this to anyone who doesn't want to be scarred.

You have no friends! Nice try! Go back to watching anime!â€  My feelings are so hurt! Bullying is not a joke. I donâ€™t want anyone else to go through what I went through.
